begin_dialogue.speaker: player
begin_dialogue.text: Welp... now that I have my new appearance, it's time to open up my new shop! I also just posted on social medias, so I hope someone comes in soon.

begin_dialogue.speaker: client
begin_dialogue.text: Hi! I saw your post on FlipFlop, and I thought your shop looked suuuuper cute! Would you be able to design an outfit for me?

begin_dialogue.speaker: player
begin_dialogue.text: But of course! Let me know what kind of style and colors you want!

generic_start_0.speaker: player
generic_start_0.text: Another day, another dollar... and hopefully another client.

generic_start_0.speaker: player
generic_start_0.text: Hi, yes! Welcome in! How may I help you?

generic_start_0.speaker: client
generic_start_0.text: I, uh... was hoping if you could decide on what I could wear to this event...

generic_start_1.speaker: player
generic_start_1.text: Oh, not at all! I just opened up the shop, so you're right on time. What didya need help with?

generic_start_1.speaker: client
generic_start_1.text: Hey! One of my friends mentioned this place for some cute designs! I wanna check out what you got.

generic_start_1.speaker: player
generic_start_1.text: Hehehe, your friend is right! Let me see what I can make for you.

generic_start_2.speaker: player
generic_start_2.text: After a nice cup of coffee and some good rest, I'm ready for the day!

generic_start_2.speaker: player
generic_start_2.text: I can get used to this lifestyle already.

generic_start_2.speaker: client
generic_start_2.text: Howdy! This is a nice place ya got here. It's pretty cozy.

generic_start_2.speaker: player
generic_start_2.text: Haha, thank you! How may I help you?

generic_start_2.speaker: client
generic_start_2.text: I'm lookin' for a nice little fit that I can get for a future endeavor of mine! I gotta dress to impress!

generic_start_2.speaker: player
generic_start_2.text: Hoo boy, I got just the wardrobe you need!

generic_start_3.speaker: player
generic_start_3.text: That was a good sleep, especially after yesterday... Let's see how today goes.

generic_start_3.speaker: client
generic_start_3.text: Hello there! I'm here for a new outfit!

generic_start_3.speaker: player
generic_start_3.text: You came to the right place! What kind of style are you going for?

success_0.speaker: client
success_0.text: Oh. My. Gosh. This is awesome! I love you, thank you so much. Here's an extra tip, because more people NEED to go here.

success_0.speaker: player
success_0.text: I'm so happy to hear that, and thank you for the tip! It would help if you leave a 5 star rating on Kelp!

success_0.speaker: client
success_0.text: I am one step ahead of you, don't even worry about it.

success_1.speaker: player
success_1.text: What do you think? Do you like it?

success_1.speaker: client
success_1.text: LOVE IT! THIS IS PERFECT!!! You really know your stuff!! I gotta tell all my friends about this place. Here's some extra tip!

success_2.speaker: player
success_2.text: There you go, all done! You look fabulous in that.

success_2.speaker: client
success_2.text: Why, thank you so much! This ensemble is lovely! This shop is so charming, I have to go here again.

fail_0.speaker: client
fail_0.text: Eh, it... it's fine, I suppose.

fail_1.speaker: player
fail_1.text: What's wrong? Do you not like it?

fail_1.speaker: client
fail_1.text: It's not that I don't like it... I'm just not sure if this will be entirely appropriate...

fail_1.speaker: client
fail_1.text: I really appreciate the fit, though!

fail_2.speaker: player
fail_2.text: What's up? Is there anything you need?

fail_2.speaker: client
fail_2.text: This is...certainly something. It is quite unique. It is the most outfit ever.

fail_2.speaker: player
fail_2.text: (I'm not sure what that means, but they probably don't like it...)

fail_3.speaker: client
fail_3.text: Sorry chief... but this isn't exactly what I was looking for.

fail_3.speaker: player
fail_3.text: (Darn it... Can't say that I didn't try, though.)

fail_3.speaker: player
fail_3.text: I'm sorry about that. I hope you have a great rest of your day!

fail_4.speaker: player
fail_4.text: (This is awkward... but I'm gonna take this silence as dissatisfaction.)

okay_0.speaker: client
okay_0.text: Yeah! I think it's alright. Not perfect, but... I lieky :3

okay_0.speaker: player
okay_0.text: I hope you enjoy your purchase!

okay_1.speaker: player
okay_1.text: Aww, I'm glad you like it!

okay_1.speaker: client
okay_1.text: Of course I like it! Yes, this will work.

okay_2.speaker: client
okay_2.text: It's pretty darn good, that's what it is. I can get used to a look like this.

okay_2.speaker: player
okay_2.text: Phew, you scared me! Haha! Thank you for stopping by!

okay_3.speaker: client
okay_3.text: This is a nice place you have here! I'll be coming back soon, just you wait.
